title: Vincent Ngaro
text:
Vincent Ngaro is a Cook Island professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 2000s and 2010s who has represented the <a href="Cook%20Islands%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Cook Islands</a>.
In 2009 Ngaro played in the <a href="2009%20Pacific%20Cup">2009 Pacific Cup</a>. He scored a try in the 22-20 qualifying round victory over <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Samoa</a>. He also scored a try in the 24-22 semi-final victory over <a href="Fiji%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Fiji</a>.
In 2011 Ngaro won the top flight (A1) <a href="Manly-Warringah/North%20Sydney%20District%20Rugby%20League">Manly-Warringah District Junior Rugby League</a> Grand Final for the Narraweena Hawks.
In 2014 he was player of the year in the <a href="Sydney%20Shield">Sydney Shield</a> competition.
